excerpt: "A New Jersey man who wore a throwback Philadelphia Eagles beanie to the Jan. 6 riot was arrested by the FBI this week after online \"sedition hunters\" identified him with the help of facial recognition and Facebook photos from a 2020 family trip to the pumpkin patch."
